data.name: StyleSet.Help
data.value: Style set name for the gallery elements

data.name: MaxHeight.Help
data.value: Maximum height of a image list in CSS units, used to make scrollbars visible (leave empty to disable).

data.name: Target.Help
data.value: Set link target. Enter window or frame name for custom target or leave empty for no target. Has no meaning if jQuery lightbox is used, but may be useful without it.

data.name: UseLightbox.Help
data.value: Check to use Lightbox-like viewer or image gallery jQuery module.

data.name: UseScrollbar.Help
data.value: Check to use jQuery scrollbar module.

data.name: UseImageHandler.Help
data.value: Check to use external image handler to create thumbnails (only R7.ImageHandler is supported at this time).

data.name: ImageHandlerParams.Help
data.value: Add URL parameter string which will be added to image handler URL if name=value pairs format, or leave empty to use default URL. Currently supported tags: {fileticket}, {fileid}, {width}, {height}.

data.name: ShowTitles.Help
data.value: If checked, images title is displayed

data.name: Expand.Help
data.value: If checked, each column width are calculated as 100% / number of columns approximately. This setting only effective if a columns number is specified explicitly (not auto).

data.name: Header.Help
data.value: Enter HTML to be placed before (above) image list. This setting could replace Header value from Module Settings / Advanced tab.

data.name: Footer.Help
data.value: Enter HTML to be placed after (below) image list. This setting could replace Footer value from Module Settings / Advanced tab.

data.name: ReplaceHeaderAndFooter.Help
data.value: Check to replace module Header and Footer settings from Module Settings / Advanced tab with the text editors content above.

data.name: Columns.Help
data.value: Set number of columns in the image list. If value set to 0, all available width will be taken by images.

data.name: ImageWidth.Help
data.value: Specify width of the displayed image in any CSS units. If not set, thumbnail width or original image width will be used.

data.name: ImageHeight.Help
data.value: Specify height of the displayed image in any CSS units. If not set, thumbnail height or original image height will be used.

data.name: ThumbWidth.Help
data.value: Specify thumbnail image width in px or leave empty.

data.name: ThumbHeight.Help
data.value: Specify thumbnail image width in pixels or leave empty.

data.name: NumberOfRecords.Help
data.value: Enter the number of records to show or leave empty to show it all.

data.name: SortOrder.Help
data.value: Check if image list should be sorted by SortIndex ascending.

data.name: LightboxType.Help
data.value: Select the lightbox module to use.
